name: EconLive Project
description:
Description: An EconLive visual novel by Kelly Kosasih that features economics in real life. This visual novel was a project for UCI's Econ 20A class in Spring 2018 quarter.

Please Note: All characters and events depicted in this visual novel are entirely fictitious. Any similarity to actual events or persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.

PLEASE DO NOT REDISTRIBUTE!
